alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:52AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carteret County through 630 AM EDT... At 552 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harkers Island, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Harkers Island, Sealevel, Marshallberg, Davis, Straits, Smyrna, Atlantic, Otway, Williston, Stacy, Michael J Smith Airport, Cape Lookout Lighthouse, Rachel Carson Estuarine Reserve, Fort Macon State Park and Gloucester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
